item.description:
Please join us for a showing of this seminal documentary which provides compelling evidence to help explain the deteriorating health of Americans, especially among children, and offers a recipe for protecting ourselves and our future.  A question and answer period will follow the film.  Come and have your questions answered and find out how you can avoid GMO's (genetically modified organisms).

 

Recommended donation of $5.00 plus a can of food for the Connecticut Food Bank.
item.name: Genetic Roulette:The Documented Health Risks of GMOs-Genetically Engineered Food
